1: I lift my soul to the highest good
2: I trust fully and stand with confident, enduring honor.
3: Steadfast trust brings honor and enduring integrity.
4: I embrace instruction and follow the right path.
5: I walk in truth and learn with steady patience.
6: Let enduring compassion and kindness guide every action.
7: Mercy and goodness guide how you remember people.
8: A good and upright teacher guides all on the right way.
9: The humble receive guidance and learn the right path.
10: Keeping promises fills every path with mercy and truth.
11: I receive abundant forgiveness through steadfast goodness.
12: Reverence grants guidance for the path you choose.
13: A person lives in peace, and their descendants inherit the earth.
14: Reverence invites guidance and reveals a faithful commitment.
15: I stay attentive to guidance and walk free of traps.
16: Mercy comes and restores comfort and strength.
17: I step into freedom and my heart flourishes in peace.
18: I welcome compassion and experience complete forgiveness.
19: Compassionate attention supports each person during overwhelming challenges.
20: I trust and stay safe and honored
21: Integrity and uprightness sustain me as I wait with hope.
22: Your people live in peace and freedom.
